components.text:
Mandrakes are a group of. perennial herbaceous plants with long, parsnip shaped roots.

If agitated, mandrakes will scream causing injury or even death. Wearing $(b)$(el:items/earmuffs)earmuffs$(/el)$(/b) can protect you, and they sleep at night.

$(b)Procurement:$(/b)
Dropped by tall and short grass
